caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. DARREN GEORGE WALLACE,

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 487 MAL 2005, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 27th day of September 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
Mr. Justice Eakin did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
